00036     class AccessExcept
00037       :public Exception {
00038     public:

00046        :Exception(message) {}
00048       ~AccessExcept() throw() {}

00051     
00067     template<class Ty>
00068     class SharedVar :boost::noncopyable {
00069     private:
00070       typedef boost::recursive_timed_mutex mutex_type;
00071 
00072     public:
00100       typedef boost::unique_lock< SharedVar<Ty> > scoped_lock;
00101       
00110       SharedVar(typename boost::call_traits<Ty>::param_type val=Ty())
00111        :m_lockCount(0ul), m_var(val) {}
00113       ~SharedVar() {}
00114       
00129       void lock() const {
00130        m_mtx.lock();
00131        ++m_lockCount;
00132       }
00146       void unlock() const {
00147        if( ownIt() ) {
00148          --m_lockCount;
00149          m_mtx.unlock();
00150        }
00151       }
00152       
00153       
00168       typename boost::call_traits<Ty>::param_type 
00169       operator=(typename boost::call_traits<Ty>::param_type value) {
00170        scoped_lock lock(*this);
00171        m_var = value;
00172        return value;
00173       }
00188       bool ownIt() const {
00189        mutex_type::scoped_try_lock lock(m_mtx);
00190        return lock.owns_lock() && m_lockCount>0;
00191       }
00192       
00209       Ty &operator* () {
00210        if( !ownIt() )
00211          throw AccessExcept("Cannot access a shared var which I don't own.");
00212        return m_var;
00213       }
00214 
00215       Ty const &operator* () const {
00216        if( !ownIt() )
00217          throw AccessExcept("Cannot access a shared var which I don't own.");
00218        return m_var;
00219       }
00238       Ty *operator->() {
00239        return &operator* ();
00240       }
00241 
00242       Ty const *operator->() const {
00243        return &operator* ();
00244       }
00247     private:
00249       mutable mutex_type m_mtx;       
00250 
00261       mutable size_t     m_lockCount; 
00262       
00264       Ty m_var;
00265       
00266     }; // TREX::utils::SharedVar<>
00267 
00268   } // TREX::utils
00269 } // TREX
